title: #96: Lessons to be Learned from Texas Mass Shooting
description:
The RCP team is joined by Francey Hakes to discuss the Texas shooting and the links with domestic violence, coercive control and stalking. These cases do not come out of the blue. There is always a continuum of abuse and violence and we must join the dots when perpetrators abuse significant others and offend outside the home.

 

These are the most dangerous of cases and we discuss the high risk factors and warning signs.

 

#HerNameWasSara

#HisNamesWasDennis

#HerNameWasAnnabelle

#HerNamesWasHaley

#HisNameWasDanny

#HerNameWasEmily

#HisNameWasNoah

#HerNameWasJenni

#HerNamesWasTara

#HisNameWasJames

#HerNameWasKarla

#HisNameWasBryan

#HerNameWasMegan

#HerNameWasCrystal 

#PreventingMurderInSlowMotion
